channel.title: Need a bit of code
channel.description: ok, i just realized a bug in my chat stuff ive been working on. on login, it doesnt ignore caps, but it the load file stuff does, so 2 people can log in with the names Tking and tking, and they both get same user file... this isnt so bad because the files are pass protected, but it could cause a few problems later. so what i need is a void that will turn a string to lowercase... like tolowercase(newnick); Thanks in advanced, im sure its easy but im not that great with java

item.title: Need a bit of code
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

ok, i just realized a bug in my chat stuff ive been working on. on login, it doesnt ignore caps, but it the load file stuff does, so 2 people can log in with the names Tking and tking, and they both get same user file… this isnt so bad because the files are pass protected, but it could cause a few problems later. so what i need is a void that will turn a string to lowercase… like tolowercase(newnick);
Thanks in advanced, im sure its easy but im not that great with java
